page.title: 06COUNTY POLICE HEADQUARTERS
page.content: The Police Headquaters is situated just off Woburn Road kempston. It was {opened in 1978}by the Duchess of Kent. It is built in extensive grounds.Inside the building,450 people work,controlling a{1,000 strong police {force in the County.}The main area is the{Control Room,}where they work with computers and VDU's linking to the National Police Computer. If a{major {disaster}ever happened this room is vital. The{motorway}in the county and Buckinghamshire is watched over by this control room. An inspector and sergeant keep an eye on the staff. {Other departments}are Fire Arms, Discipline and Complaints, training, which has a sports hall, squash court, bowling green, shooting range and tennis courts, fingerprints, records, central ticket office, canteen,Museum, emergency room and Reference Hall.
